original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Makkaṭakavagga
analyzed: makkaṭaka vagga

original: 4. Pavanaṅgapañha
analyzed: pava naṅga pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘pavanassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena pavanassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, pavanaṁ nāma asucijanaṁ paṭicchādeti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja pavanam nāma asuci janam paṭicchāda iti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paresaṁ aparaddhaṁ khalitaṁ paṭicchādetabbaṁ na vivaritabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena paresam aparaddham khalitam paṭicchādetabbam na

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pavanassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pavanassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pavanaṁ suññaṁ pacurajanehi;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja pavanam suññam pacurajanehi

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhijālehi sabbehi ca kilesehi suññena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena rāga dosa moha māna diṭṭhi jālehi sabbehi ca kilesehi suññena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pavanassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja pavanassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pavanaṁ vivittaṁ janasambādharahitaṁ;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja pavanam vivittam jana sambādha rahita

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pavanassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja pavanassa tatiyam aṅgam gahetabba

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pavanaṁ santaṁ parisuddhaṁ;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja pavanam santam parisuddha

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabbaṁ, nibbutena pahīnamānena pahīnamakkhena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabba nibbutena pahīna mānena pahīna makkhena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pavanassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pavanassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, pavanaṁ ariyajanasaṁsevitaṁ;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja pavanam ariya jana sa sevita

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ariyajanasaṁsevitena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ariya jana sa sevitena

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, pavanassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja pavanassa pañcamaṃ aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṁyuttanikāyavare—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sayutta nikāya vare

original: ‘Pavivittehi ariyehi,
analyzed: pavivittehi ariyehi

original: pahitattehi jhāyibhi;
analyzed: pahitattehi jhāyibhi

original: Niccaṁ āraddhavīriyehi,
analyzed: niccam āraddha vīriyehi

original: paṇḍitehi sahāvase’”ti.
analyzed: paṇḍitehi saha āvasa iti

original: Pavanaṅgapañho catuttho.
analyzed: pavanaṅga pañho catuttho
